articles.title: Kilmeade slams Colonial Pipeline hack payoff: Americans are now ‘paying the price’ - Fox News
articles.description: Colonial Pipeline paid nearly $5 million to Russian hackers, but "Fox News Primetime" host Brian Kilmeade said now the American people are being forced to take the blow.
articles.content:

articles.author: Claire Cain Miller, Kevin Quealy, Margot Sanger-Katz
articles.title: Hundreds of Epidemiologists Expected Mask-Wearing in Public for at Least a Year - The New York Times
articles.description: The C.D.C. said Thursday that vaccinated Americans no longer needed masks in most places. Other disease experts recently had a different message: that masks were necessary in public.
articles.content: Respondents also said that as long as the virus was still spreading, masks were important to protect high-risk people and those who cannot be vaccinated, like children or people who have underlying h… [+1530 chars]

articles.description: US president urges Americans not to panic-buy fuel, warns against price-gauging and says shortages will ease soon
articles.content:

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Why many Covid experts think Americans can ditch their masks soon - New Straits Times
articles.description: WASHINGTON: Covid cases are declining quickly while vaccinations continue to rise slowly but surely in the United States, the former epicenter of the pandemic.

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: TV giant Ellen DeGeneres to end her long-running talk show - New Straits Times
articles.description: NEW YORK: Ellen DeGeneres, a star of daytime American talk show culture, on Wednesday said she was calling it quits after 19 seasons anchoring a TV staple that had become tainted by toxic workplace allegations.
